Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_00
Interaction.Text: Ah, there you are! You must be my new assistant, yes? Thank goodness! You mustn’t keep your future captain waiting… but I will forgive you just this once.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_01
Interaction.Text: I’m not here to -

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_02
Interaction.Text: Now, before I take you on as my partner, let me ask you this, ma cherie -- what makes a captain, in your view?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_02
Interaction.Text: The vote of the crew?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_031
Interaction.Text: The vote of -

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_02
Interaction.Text: Skilled leadership?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_032
Interaction.Text: Skilled lead -

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_02
Interaction.Text: Not sinking the ship?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_033
Interaction.Text: Not sink -

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_04
Interaction.Text: I see... that’s quite charming, however, I’m afraid it lacks a certain appeal.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_05
Interaction.Text: We are pirates, mon amie, pirates! We sail for glory, for riches, for lavish silks and the golden gleam of treasure!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_06
Interaction.Text: *Yawn*

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_07
Interaction.Text: So, for your first task as my dear assistant, you must help me become the very image of a true captain. Do you understand?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_08
Interaction.Text: Hm? Oh, yeah, sure. (Please stop talking.)

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_09
Interaction.Text: Excellent! With such disorder on our noble vessel, I had feared no one would hear my plight… but you are a gem among scoundrels, truly! I knew you would take my side. This humble first mate is in your debt, ma cherie.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_10
Interaction.Text: That’s me. A dirty, rotten gem of a pirate.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_11
Interaction.Text: I require a mark of authority, that speaks to my noble status on this ship. Something only a true captain would wear!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_intro_12
Interaction.Text: Surely you can find something here, can you not? Go ahead and get to it! Chop chop!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_00
Interaction.Text: Have you found it yet, ma cherie? That regal something that will anoint me as a true captain?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_00
Interaction.Text: What were you looking for again?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_00
Interaction.Text: Have you seen that portrait over there?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_00
Interaction.Text: No, not yet.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_10
Interaction.Text: What were you looking for again?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_11
Interaction.Text: Alas, mon amie! Were you not listening? I must have some regal adornment that speaks to all my captainly qualities!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_12
Interaction.Text: Some captains may don a commanding pirate’s hat, or a glorious head of hair, or a sword whose gleam blinds all who look upon it…

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_13
Interaction.Text: I must have something worthy of my charming physique!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_14
Interaction.Text: Now get to it! Chop chop!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_20
Interaction.Text: Check out Captain Duke’s wig in that portrait over there. Pretty nice, huh?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_21
Interaction.Text: Oh, my… I had no idea our late captain had such a lovely head of hair! I’m quite envious.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_22
Interaction.Text: But alas, we shall never see the captain’s face nor hair again… oh, woe! To think I never praised their beauty while they still lived!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_23
Interaction.Text: Bloo hoo hoo!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_24
Interaction.Text: Um...there, there...?

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_30
Interaction.Text: No, not yet.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_quest_31
Interaction.Text: Well get to it! Chop chop!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_fail_00
Interaction.Text: Oh? Have you found it? Let me...

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_fail_01
Interaction.Text: Oh? Have you found it? Let me...

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_fail_02
Interaction.Text: Ahaha! Oh, la la! Ohohoho! You must be joking, ma cherie... I haven’t the slightest clue what that is.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_fail_03
Interaction.Text: And thus, I’m afraid that no captain would want anything to do with it! Hurry along now, and find something nice.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_success_00
Interaction.Text: Back again? What have you found this time? Let me see, now.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_success_01
Interaction.Text: One...ah...handcrafted wig for the would-be captain.

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_success_02
Interaction.Text: Hm? This looks… so very familiar… yes, my eyes do not betray me!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_success_03
Interaction.Text: So pure, woven of such lovely fibers, like the foam of rushing tides that birthed Aphrodite herself! It’s the very image of captainly beauty!

Interaction.Name: firstmate_give_mop_success_04
Interaction.Text: Fantastique! I’m in love, simply in love! I knew I could count on you, ma cherie!
